head.title: Dr. Glass Is to Wed Dr. D. M. Sacknoff

hedline.hl1: Dr. Glass Is to Wed Dr. D. M. Sacknoff

block.p: LEAD: Dr. Andrea Leslie Glass and Dr. David Matthew Sacknoff, 1988 graduates of the New York Medical College and residents in internal medicine at Lenox Hill Hospital in New York, are planning an October wedding. The announcement was made by the prospective bride's parents, Judith R. Glass of Huntington, L.I., and Don B.

LEAD: Dr. Andrea Leslie Glass and Dr. David Matthew Sacknoff, 1988 graduates of the New York Medical College and residents in internal medicine at Lenox Hill Hospital in New York, are planning an October wedding. The announcement was made by the prospective bride's parents, Judith R. Glass of Huntington, L.I., and Don B.

Dr. Andrea Leslie Glass and Dr. David Matthew Sacknoff, 1988 graduates of the New York Medical College and residents in internal medicine at Lenox Hill Hospital in New York, are planning an October wedding. The announcement was made by the prospective bride's parents, Judith R. Glass of Huntington, L.I., and Don B. Glass of Englewood, N.J.
Dr. Glass graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. Her father is the director of purchasing for the New Jersey Sports and Exposition Authority. Her mother is a freelance writer.

Dr. Sacknoff, the son of Dr. and Mrs. Albert E. Sacknoff of Lloyd Harbor, L.I., graduated magna cum laude from Duke University. His father is chief of the department of family medicine at Huntington Hospoital.
